turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I want to order some coffee from Peets.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Coffee from Peets? Can do. Which one did you want to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on Michigan Ave in Chicago.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Michigan Avenue in Chicago, got it. What would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want one Iced Latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Small.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of milk do you want in it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 2% milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. Would you like any whipped cream on it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, add some whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, so you want one small Iced Latte with 2% milk and whipped cream, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You got it!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The total will be 8.75. Would you like me to place the order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah go ahead and order it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I have placed the order at the Peets on Michigan Ave in Chicago and your order will be available shortly. The receipt will be sent to your mobile device.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's all I needed.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, great! Have a nice day!
